00068 void ChromosomeT< int >::mutateDiffGeom( double s )
00069 {
00070     double p = 1 - ( s/size() ) / ( sqrt( 1 + sqr( s/size() ) ) + 1 );
00071 
00072     for( unsigned i = size( ); i--; )
00073         ( *this )[ i ] += Rng::diffGeom( p );
00074 }
00075 
00076 //===========================================================================
00077 
00078 void ChromosomeT< int >::mutateDiffGeom( const std::vector< double >& s,
00079                                          bool cycle )
00080 {
00081     RANGE_CHECK( s.size( ) <= size( ) )
00082 
00083     for( unsigned i = cycle ? size( ) : s.size( ); i--; ) {
00084         double t = s[ i % s.size( ) ] / size( );
00085         ( *this )[ i ] += Rng::diffGeom( 1 - t / ( sqrt( 1 + t*t ) + 1 ) );
00086     }
00087 }
00088

00091 void ChromosomeT< int >::mutateDiffGeom( const ChromosomeT< double >& s,
00092                                          bool cycle )
00093 {
00094     mutateDiffGeom( static_cast< const std::vector< double >& >( s ), cycle );
00095 }
